item.text: Children, obey your parents in the Lord, for this is right.
“Honor your father and mother,” which is the first commandment accompanied by a promise, namely,
“that it will go well with you and that you will live a long time on the earth.”
Fathers, do not provoke your children to anger, but raise them up in the discipline and instruction of the Lord.
Slaves, obey your human masters with fear and trembling, in the sincerity of your heart, as to Christ,

<st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2596" class="">like</st> those who do their <st data-num="3787">work only when someone is watching</st><n id="1" />—<st data-num="5613" class="">as</st> <st data-num="441" class="">people-pleasers</st>—<st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">as</st> <st data-num="1401" class="">slaves</st> of <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> <st data-num="4160" class="">doing</st> the <st data-num="2307" class="">will</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="5590" class="">heart</st>.<n id="2" />

Obey<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="2133" class="">enthusiasm</st>, <st data-num="5613">as</st> though <st data-num="1398" class="">serving</st> the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="444" class="">people</st>,
because you know that each person, whether slave or free, if he does something good, this will be rewarded by the Lord.
Masters, treat your slaves the same way, giving up the use of threats, because you know that both you and they have the same master in heaven, and there is no favoritism with him.
Finally, be strengthened in the Lord and in the strength of his power.

<st data-num="1746" class="">Clothe</st> yourselves with the <st data-num="3833" class="">full armor</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>, <st data-num="4314" class="">so that</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> will be <st data-num="1410" class="">able</st> to <st data-num="2476" class="">stand</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">against</st> the <st data-num="3180" class="">schemes</st><n id="1" /> of the <st data-num="1228" class="">devil</st>.

<st data-num="3754" class="">For</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="3823" class="">struggle</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">against</st> <st data-num="4561" class="">flesh</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="129" class="">blood</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">against</st> the <st data-num="2888" class="">rulers</st>, <st data-num="4314" class="">against</st> the <st data-num="1849" class="">powers</st>, <st data-num="4314" class="">against</st> the <st data-num="2888">world rulers</st> of <st data-num="3778" class="">this</st> <st data-num="4655" class="">darkness</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="4314" class="">against</st> the <st data-num="4152">spiritual forces</st><n id="4" /> of <st data-num="4189" class="">evil</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2032" class="">heavens</st>.<n id="5" />

<st data-num="1223" class="">For</st> <st data-num="3778">this reason</st>, <st data-num="353">take up</st> the <st data-num="3833">full armor</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="2443">so that</st> you may be <st data-num="1410" class="">able</st> to <st data-num="436">stand</st> your ground<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="4190" class="">evil</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> having <st data-num="2716" class="">done</st> <st data-num="537" class="">everything</st>, to <st data-num="2476" class="">stand</st>.

<st data-num="2476">Stand firm</st> <st data-num="3767" class="">therefore</st>, by <st data-num="4024">fastening<n id="1" /> the belt</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">of</st> <st data-num="225" class="">truth</st> around <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="3751" class="">waist</st>,<n id="2" /> by <st data-num="1746">putting on</st> the <st data-num="2382" class="">breastplate</st> of <st data-num="1343" class="">righteousness</st>,

by <st data-num="5265" class="">fitting</st> your<n id="1" /> <st data-num="4228" class="">feet</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">with</st> the <st data-num="2091" class="">preparation</st> that comes from the <st data-num="2098">good news</st><n id="2" /> of <st data-num="1515" class="">peace</st>,<n id="3" />

and <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> of this,<n id="1" /> by <st data-num="353">taking up</st> the <st data-num="2375" class="">shield</st><n id="2" /> of <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">with</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">which</st> you <st data-num="1410" class="">can</st> <st data-num="4570" class="">extinguish</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="4448" class="">flaming</st> <st data-num="956" class="">arrows</st> of the <st data-num="4190">evil one</st>.
And take the helmet of salvation and the sword of the Spirit (which is the word of God).

<st data-num="1223" class="">With</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">every</st> <st data-num="4335" class="">prayer</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1162" class="">petition</st>, <st data-num="4336" class="">pray</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">at</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="2540" class="">times</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="4151" class="">Spirit</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">this</st> end<n id="2" /> be <st data-num="69" class="">alert</st>, <st data-num="1722" class="">with</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="4343" class="">perseverance</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1162">petitions</st> <st data-num="4012" class="">for</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="40" class="">saints</st>.

Pray<n id="1" /> <st data-num="5228" class="">for</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st>, <st data-num="2443" class="">that</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> may be <st data-num="1325" class="">given</st> the right <st data-num="3056">words</st> when <st data-num="1473" class="">I</st> <st data-num="457" class="">begin</st> to <st data-num="4750">speak</st><n id="2" />—that I may <st data-num="3954" class="">confidently</st> <st data-num="1107">make known</st><n id="3" /> the <st data-num="3466" class="">mystery</st> of the <st data-num="2098" class="">gospel</st>,
for which I am an ambassador in chains. Pray that I may be able to speak boldly as I ought to speak.
Tychicus, my dear brother and faithful servant in the Lord, will make everything known to you, so that you too may know about my circumstances, how I am doing.
I have sent him to you for this very purpose, that you may know our circumstances and that he may encourage your hearts.
Peace to the brothers and sisters, and love with faith, from God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.
Grace be with all those who love our Lord Jesus Christ with an undying love.
